description: Application for non-material amendment to planning permission reference 231794HH dated 27.06.2023 for "Single storey rear and side extension (following the demolition of the existing shed and side addition), installation of skylights and a bespoke roof lantern, external insulation and render to be applied to the side wall, raised patio and steps down to the garden". Amendments seeks changes to the fenestration, installation of x2 wall lights, x1 bulkhead light and x1 air source heat pump with a concrete supporting pad.
decision_conditions: The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawing / document title number(s): BG-R00-PR-102 PROPOSED FLOOR PLANS; BG-R00-PR-103 PROPOSED FLOOR PLANS; BG-R00-PR-105 PROPOSED ELEVATIONS; BG-R00-PR-106 PROPOSED ELEVATIONS; BG-R00-PR-107 PROPOSED SECTIONS
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt and in the interests of proper planning.
